---
title: "Track and Field Data Science Project"
---

This is my final project in my data science course from Fall 2023. My Shiny App analyzes the last 14 years of the Division III New England Region Track and Field Championships. See which events have been dominated by which schools, and how significant the margins of improvement are from year to year. Click the link below to access the Github Repository.
